pageContent: Purpose of review: Erectile dysfunction is a major source of morbidity for many men who undergo radical prostatectomy for localized prostate cancer annually. Few areas of urology remain as controversial as penile rehabilitation postprostatectomy, an ill defined treatment strategy designed to minimize the incidence and severity of erectile dysfunction.

metaData.source:
Sexual values as the key to maintaining satisfying sex after prostate cancer treatment: the physical pleasure-relational intimacy model of sexual motivation
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/24045902/
